file.name: swagger.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: 'My first API'
  contact:
    email: support@example.com
  version: 1.0.0
paths:
  /auth/login:
    post:
      tags:
        - auth
      summary: 'Autenticação de usuário'
      operationId: AuthLogin
      parameters:
        -
          name: email
          in: query
          description: 'E-mail para autenticação'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: password
          in: query
          description: 'Senha para autenticação'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  /admin/auth/login:
    post:
      tags:
        - auth
      summary: 'Autenticação da administração'
      operationId: AuthAdminLogin
      parameters:
        -
          name: email
          in: query
          description: 'E-mail para autenticação'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: password
          in: query
          description: 'Senha para autenticação'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  /auth/refresh:
    post:
      tags:
        - auth
      summary: 'Atualiza o token atual do usuário'
      operationId: AuthRefresh
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  /categories:
    get:
      tags:
        - categories
      summary: 'Lista todas as categorias'
      operationId: GetCategories
      parameters:
        -
          name: Api-key
          in: header
          description: 'Api Key'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: includes
          in: query
          description: 'Faz o include das relações'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
    post:
      tags:
        - categories
      summary: 'Cria uma categoria'
      operationId: PostCategory
      parameters:
        -
          name: Api-key
          in: header
          description: 'Api Key'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: name
          in: query
          description: 'Nome da categoria'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  '/categories/{id}':
    get:
      tags:
        - categories
      summary: 'Lista uma categoria'
      operationId: GetCategory
      parameters:
        -
          name: Api-key
          in: header
          description: 'Api Key'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID da categoria'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
    put:
      tags:
        - categories
      summary: 'Atualiza uma categoria'
      operationId: PutCategory
      parameters:
        -
          name: Api-key
          in: header
          description: 'Api Key'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID da categoria'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: name
          in: query
          description: 'Nome da categoria'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
    delete:
      tags:
        - categories
      summary: 'Apaga uma categoria'
      operationId: DeleteCategory
      parameters:
        -
          name: Api-key
          in: header
          description: 'Api Key'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID da categoria'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  /products:
    get:
      tags:
        - products
      summary: 'Lista todas os produtos'
      operationId: GetProducts
      parameters:
        -
          name: Api-key
          in: header
          description: 'Api Key'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: category_id
          in: query
          description: 'ID da categoria'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: includes
          in: query
          description: 'Faz o include das relações'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
    post:
      tags:
        - products
      summary: 'Cria um produto'
      operationId: PostProduct
      parameters:
        -
          name: Api-key
          in: header
          description: 'Api Key'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: name
          in: query
          description: 'Nome do produto'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: description
          in: query
          description: 'Descrição do produto'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: price
          in: query
          description: 'Preço do produto'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: category_id
          in: query
          description: 'ID da categoria'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  '/products/{id}':
    get:
      tags:
        - products
      summary: 'Lista um produto'
      operationId: GetProduct
      parameters:
        -
          name: Api-key
          in: header
          description: 'Api Key'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do produto'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
    put:
      tags:
        - products
      summary: 'Atualiza um produto'
      operationId: PutProduct
      parameters:
        -
          name: Api-key
          in: header
          description: 'Api Key'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do produto'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: name
          in: query
          description: 'Nome do produto'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: description
          in: query
          description: 'Descrição do produto'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: price
          in: query
          description: 'Preço do produto'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: category_id
          in: query
          description: 'ID da categoria'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
    delete:
      tags:
        - products
      summary: 'Apaga um produto'
      operationId: DeleteProduct
      parameters:
        -
          name: Api-key
          in: header
          description: 'Api Key'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do produto'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  /coupons:
    post:
      tags:
        - coupons
      summary: 'Gera um cupom'
      operationId: StoreCoupon
      parameters:
        -
          name: Api-key
          in: header
          description: 'Api Key'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: value
          in: query
          description: 'Valor do cupom'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: type_id
          in: query
          description: 'Tipo do cupom (1-EXP, 2-COIN)'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  /bans:
    get:
      tags:
        - bans
      summary: 'Lista todos os bans até o momento'
      operationId: GetBanList
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
    post:
      tags:
        - bans
      summary: 'Cria um novo ban'
      operationId: StoreBan
      parameters:
        -
          name: admin_id
          in: query
          description: 'ID de quem deu o ban'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: victim_id
          in: query
          description: 'ID de quem recebeu o ban'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: type
          in: query
          description: 'Tipo de ban (ban/mute/kick)'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: reason
          in: query
          description: 'Razão do ban'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: time
          in: query
          description: 'Duração do ban'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  '/bans/{id}/revoke':
    get:
      tags:
        - bans
      summary: 'Lista todos os bans até o momento'
      operationId: GetBanList
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do usuário'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  /languages:
    get:
      tags:
        - languages
      summary: 'Lista todas as linguagens de programação no projeto'
      operationId: GetLanguages
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  '/languages/{id}':
    get:
      tags:
        - languages
      summary: 'Lista todas as linguagens de programação no projeto'
      operationId: GetLanguages
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID da linguagem'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  '/users/{discord_id}/levelup':
    post:
      tags:
        - users
      summary: 'Dá exp para um usuário'
      operationId: PostUserXp
      parameters:
        -
          name: Api-key
          in: header
          description: 'Api Key'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: discord_id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do usuário do Discord'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  /ranking:
    get:
      tags:
        - ranking
      summary: 'Lista o raking de usuários'
      operationId: GetRanking
      parameters:
        -
          name: reputation
          in: query
          description: 'Ordenar por reputation (0 - False, 1 - True)'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  '/store/{product_id}':
    post:
      tags:
        - store
      summary: 'Realiza a compra de um produto'
      operationId: PostStore
      parameters:
        -
          name: Api-key
          in: header
          description: 'Api Key'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: product_id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do produto'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: discord_id
          in: query
          description: 'ID do usuário do DIscord'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  /tips/development:
    get:
      tags:
        - tips
      summary: 'Lista todas as dicas armazenadas de desenvolvimento'
      operationId: GetDevelopmentTips
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
    post:
      tags:
        - tips
      summary: 'Cria uma nova dica para o estudo de programação'
      operationId: StoreDevelopmentTip
      parameters:
        -
          name: tip
          in: query
          description: 'Dica que vai rolar'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  '/tips/development/{id}':
    delete:
      tags:
        - tips
      summary: 'Deleta uma dica de desenvolvimento'
      operationId: DeleteDevelopmentTip
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID da dica'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  /tips/english:
    get:
      tags:
        - tips
      summary: 'Lista todas as dicas armazenadas de inglês'
      operationId: GetEnglishTips
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
    post:
      tags:
        - tips
      summary: 'Cria uma nova dica para o estudo de inglês'
      operationId: StoreEnglishTop
      parameters:
        -
          name: tip
          in: query
          description: 'Dica que vai rolar'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  '/tips/english/{id}':
    delete:
      tags:
        - tips
      summary: 'Deleta uma dica de desenvolvimento'
      operationId: DeleteEnglishTip
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID da dica'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  /users:
    get:
      tags:
        - users
      summary: 'Lista todos os usuários'
      operationId: GetUsers
      parameters:
        -
          name: Api-key
          in: header
          description: 'Api Key'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: date
          in: query
          description: 'Data para filtrar'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: twitch
          in: query
          description: 'Nick da Twitch'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
    post:
      tags:
        - users
      summary: 'Cria um novo usuário'
      operationId: StoreUser
      parameters:
        -
          name: Api-key
          in: header
          description: 'Api Key'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: discord_id
          in: query
          description: 'ID do usuário do Discord'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  '/users/{discord_id}':
    get:
      tags:
        - users
      summary: 'Mostra as informações de um usuário'
      operationId: GetUser
      parameters:
        -
          name: Api-key
          in: header
          description: 'Api Key'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: discord_id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do usuário do Discord'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
    put:
      tags:
        - users
      summary: 'Altera um usuário'
      operationId: StoreUser
      parameters:
        -
          name: Api-key
          in: header
          description: 'Api Key'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: discord_id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do usuário do Discord'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: name
          in: query
          description: 'Nome da pessoa'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: nickname
          in: query
          description: 'Apelido da pessoa'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: git
          in: query
          description: 'Link do git'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: language
          in: query
          description: 'Linguagem em formato ''Locale'''
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: about
          in: query
          description: 'Informações pessoais do usuário'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: twitch
          in: query
          description: 'Nickname da twitch do usuário'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
    delete:
      tags:
        - users
      summary: 'Apaga um usuário'
      operationId: DeleteUser
      parameters:
        -
          name: Api-key
          in: header
          description: 'Api Key'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: discord_id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do usuário do Discord'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  '/users/{discord_id}/daily':
    post:
      tags:
        - users
      summary: 'Gerador de hCoins diário'
      operationId: Coins
      parameters:
        -
          name: Api-key
          in: header
          description: 'Api Key'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: discord_id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do usuário do Discord'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  '/users/{discord_id}/money/add':
    post:
      tags:
        - users
        - coins
      summary: 'Adiciona hCoins para um usuário'
      operationId: AddCoin
      parameters:
        -
          name: discord_id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do usuário do Discord'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: value
          in: query
          description: 'Valor de hCoins que vai ser adicionado'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  '/users/{discord_id}/money/reduce':
    post:
      tags:
        - users
        - coins
      summary: 'Subtrai hCoins de um usuário'
      operationId: ReduceCoin
      parameters:
        -
          name: discord_id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do usuário do Discord'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: value
          in: query
          description: 'Valor de hCoins que vai ser subtraído'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  '/users/{discord_id}/coupon':
    post:
      tags:
        - users
        - coupons
      summary: 'Utiliza um cupom para um usuário'
      operationId: Coupon
      parameters:
        -
          name: discord_id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do usuário do Discord'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: coupon
          in: query
          description: 'Cupom que vai ser utilizado'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  '/users/{discord_id}/reputation':
    post:
      tags:
        - users
      summary: 'Adiciona reputation para um usuário'
      operationId: Reputation
      parameters:
        -
          name: Api-key
          in: header
          description: 'Api Key'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: discord_id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do Discord do usuário que está enviando a reputation'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: receive_id
          in: query
          description: 'ID do Discord do usuário que está recebendo a reputation'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  '/users/{discord_id}/products':
    get:
      tags:
        - users
      summary: 'Lista todos os produtos comprados pelo usuário'
      operationId: GetUserProducts
      parameters:
        -
          name: Api-key
          in: header
          description: 'Api Key'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: discord_id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do usuário do Discord'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...

Error: parse: parse spec: paths: /bans: get: duplicate operationId: "GetBanList"
